Also I don't know how to fix these bugs...

This game was made for 1-bit Jam. Thank you! =3

Controls

  1. Space
  2. Pointing
  3. Waiting

Really.

Lore

You have been trapped in sky fortress names Hologram. All in this fortress doesn't exist. Your point is escaping the fortress to make yourself real.

Gameplay.

As mentioned earlier, there is only one button to control the game - space. You have to solve puzzle to escape (or not) the Hologram.

Good luck.

P.s. The game will update.

P.p.s. Thank you all for playing! Thank @PureNukage (https://purenukage.itch.io/) to this beautiful 1-bit Jam!

P.p.p.s. My English can be bad, I'm sorry.
